TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 事件或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event or event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发方法，并且它表明连接过程已开始 （例如，用户已选择了某个控件并单击连接谓词），但尚未完成。The event is raised by the method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed. 事件提供了机会在完成之前取消连接。The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete. 如果连接成功完成，此事件后跟事件。If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 事件由引发方法，并表明这样的事实用户已单击断开连接的谓词，或否则调用方法。The event is raised by the method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the method has otherwise been called. 事件提供了机会取消完成之前结束连接的过程。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete. 如果连接由于成功结束，此事件后跟事件。If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the event. 中指定的方法时，将调用委托或引发事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when a or event is raised. 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件的处理程序`OnWebPartsDisconnecting`和`OnWebPartsConnecting`特性以``元素，并通过为属性指定自定义的方法名称。Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes. 此外可以以编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关以编程方式将分配一个事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 连接事件处理程序方法与事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
